description: Detects when the Console Window Host (conhost.exe) process is spawned by an uncommon parent process, which could be indicative of potential code injection activity.
author: Tim Rauch
name: Conhost Spawned By Uncommon Parent Process
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\conhost.exe" AND process.parent.executable.text:("*\\explorer.exe" OR "*\\lsass.exe" OR "*\\regsvr32.exe" OR "*\\rundll32.exe" OR "*\\services.exe" OR "*\\smss.exe" OR "*\\spoolsv.exe" OR "*\\svchost.exe" OR "*\\userinit.exe" OR "*\\wininit.exe" OR "*\\winlogon.exe")) AND (NOT process.parent.command_line.text:("*\-k\ apphost\ \-s\ AppHostSvc*" OR "*\-k\ imgsvc*" OR "*\-k\ localService\ \-p\ \-s\ RemoteRegistry*" OR "*\-k\ LocalSystemNetworkRestricted\ \-p\ \-s\ NgcSvc*" OR "*\-k\ NetSvcs\ \-p\ \-s\ NcaSvc*" OR "*\-k\ netsvcs\ \-p\ \-s\ NetSetupSvc*" OR "*\-k\ netsvcs\ \-p\ \-s\ wlidsvc*" OR "*\-k\ NetworkService\ \-p\ \-s\ DoSvc*" OR "*\-k\ wsappx\ \-p\ \-s\ AppXSvc*" OR "*\-k\ wsappx\ \-p\ \-s\ ClipSVC*"))) AND (NOT process.parent.command_line.text:("*C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Dropbox\\Client\\*" OR "*C\:\\Program\ Files\\Dropbox\\Client\\*")))
